SELECT t.*, (select count(*) from image_result_item tj where tj.result_id = t.id and severity = 'CRITICAL') as critical, (select count(*) from image_result_item tj where tj.result_id = t.id and severity = 'HIGH') as high, (select count(*) from image_result_item tj where tj.result_id = t.id and severity = 'MEDIUM') as medium, (select count(*) from image_result_item tj where tj.result_id = t.id and severity = 'LOW') as low, (select count(*) from image_result_item tj where tj.result_id = t.id and severity = 'UNKNOWN') as unknown, t1.tag_key as tagKey, t2.tag_name as tagName, u.name as user, i.type as type, i.image_url as imageUrl, i.image_tag as imageTag, i.path as path FROM image_result t left join rule_tag_mapping t1 on t1.rule_id = t.rule_id left join rule_tag t2 on t1.tag_key = t2.tag_key left join user u on t.apply_user = u.id left join image i on t.image_id = i.id
AND t.id = #{resultId}
